sentences.sContent: a sports car, allegedly stolen in Manchester
sentences.sCn: 据说是在曼彻斯特被偷的一辆跑车

sentences.sContent: ...at a time when political and religious nonsense so jeopardize the rule of reason in this allegedly enlightened democracy and around the world...

words.tran: 所谓的；声称的；被断言的
宣称（allege的过去式和过去分词）；断言

trans.tranOther: used when reporting something that people say is true, although it has not been proved
